resources.string: Input a url to fetch images

1.Fetch Images
						Fetch and display the first 20 images from a specified webpage, then select 6 images.
		2.Guess Images
						Using the selected images, the user interacts with the memory game by tapping on placeholders to uncover pairs of images and tries to match them.
		3.Bouns Game
						First, perform the same operations as in step 1 to fetch images. Then, 6 selected images will be mixed among 12 images, and the user needs to find them.
